---
title: "Quarto Presentation Demonstration"
subtitle: "A Single File Template for Quarto Presentation"
author: "Siyuan Wang"
date: 2025-01-01
toc: true
number-sections: false
highlight-style: pygments
abstract: 
  This is a template for Quarto presentation. 
  It includes basic elements like bullet points, equations, citations, and code blocks.
  You can also use it to generate PowerPoint and PDF documents.
format: 

  html:
    code-fold: true
    html-math-method: katex
    theme: lux # default, pandoc, cosmo, spacelab, lux, minty, flatly, darkly
    # for more themes: https://quarto.org/docs/output-formats/html-themes.html
    # theme: # switch light and dark theme
    #   light: flatly
    #   dark: darkly
    max-width: 1500px
    bibliography: assets/references.bib

  pdf:
    geometry:
      - top=30mm
      - left=20mm
    # hyperlink
    links-as-notes: true
    reference-location: section # block, section, margin, document # if show hyperlink in the footnote
    # Citation
    link-bibliography: true
    link-citations: true
    bibliography: assets/references.bib


  pptx:
    incremental: true
    reference-doc: assets/syw_pre_master.pptx
---

## Equations, Citations


- Einstein's theory of special relatively that expresses the equivalence of mass and energy:

    $E = mc^{2}$

- Input an inline equation: $\mathbb {E}(x) = \int xf(x)dx$


- Cite a reference like [@peng_amp_2021].
